original_title: ll & John Oates - Live in Concert
overview: This live DVD features performances from A & E's "Live By Request" series. Includes thie top hits, new material and 5 bonus songs not televised during the original broadcast. Special features include an exclusive interview with Daryl Hall and John Oates, also a photo gallery, discography and A & E's Live by Request viewer call-ins. Recorded in 5.1 Suround Sound.
title: ll & John Oates - Live in Concert
